detail_desc: Short skirt in woven fabric with reversible sequins. Zip in the side. Jersey lining.
V-neck blouse in gently draping silk with a small stand-up collar, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short, flounced dress in an airy weave with a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and a gently bell-shaped skirt. Lined.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a cotton blend.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Ankle-length jumpsuit in an organic cotton weave with short, flounced sleeves, buttons at the front and a seam at the waist with pleats at the front and elastication at the back. Pockets in the side seams and straight legs. Lined.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft cotton jersey with a zip down the front and along one leg, long sleeves and full feet.
Lace bra with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Top in soft viscose jersey with smocking at the top. Square neckline with an elasticated edge, elastication over the shoulders and short, elasticated puff sleeves.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband.
T-shirt in slub linen jersey with a round neckline, short sleeves and straight-cut hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a deep V-neck front and back with a lace trim at the front and ties at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, slits in the sides and a wide lace hem.
Metal Alice band with fabric and imitation leather appliqués and a decoration in the shape of a unicorn horn.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim in a relaxed fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs.
Wide, cropped jersey T-shirt with a print motif on the front.
Faux fur gilet with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the front and discreet pockets in the side seams. Lined.
Blouse in a cotton weave with embroidered sections and a small stand-up collar. Gathered yoke front and back, concealed buttons down the front and long puff sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs.
Tops in soft organic cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and long sleeves. Open chest pocket and a straight-cut hem.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband and ventilating mesh sections down the sides. The polyester content of the tights is recycled.

Set with a T-shirt and shorts in soft cotton. Reverse-stitched, striped T-shirt in printed slub jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and a contrasting colour neckline. Straight-cut hem with slits in the sides. Longer at the back. Shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Patterned swim shorts with elastication and ties at the waist and a fly with a hook and loop fastening. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Ankle-length leggings in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and print motifs.
Body in stretch lace with a crocheted look. Jersey-lined cups with a scalloped trim, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and press-studs at the crotch.
Loose-fitting jumper in a soft knit containing some alpaca wool with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Dressing gown in soft, gently draping satin with dropped shoulders, wide, 3/4-length sleeves and a tie belt at the waist.
Fitted vest top in ribbed jersey with a V-neck opening at the front.

Lightweight popover jacket in a recycled polyamide weave. Mesh-lined drawstring hood, zip and wind flap at the top, a patch front pocket with a flap and hook and loop fastening, covered elastication at the cuffs and a drawstring at the hem. Unlined.
Short skirt in woven fabric with a high waist and zip at the back.

Shirt in a premium cotton weave with a grandad collar with a tab at the front, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Short, wide blouse in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, gathers at the shoulders, short cap sleeves and a rounded hem. Trims down the side seams and around the hem.
Shirt in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front and at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Trainers in a textured weave with crocodile-patterned and shimmering metallic imitation leather details, a padded edge and lacing at the front. Imitation leather linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and high cut at the back.
Embossed metal earrings with a round disc at the top and a large rectangular pendant. Diameter approx. 6.3 cm.
Round earrings in painted metal. Diameter 6.5 cm.
Ankle-length dress in a patterned jacquard weave with a small stand-up collar, concealed buttons at the front and ruffles at the top front and back. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft, striped cotton jersey with embroidered text on the front.
Cropped halterneck top in soft, ribbed viscose jersey with a V-neck.
Short, ribbed vest top with decorative buttons down the front.
Classic jacket in woven fabric with a chest pocket and flap front pockets. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Sleeveless blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with a V-neck, covered buttons down the front and a yoke with decorative gathers at the shoulders and back. Rounded hem, longer at the back.
Thong briefs in lace and microfibre with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow elastication at the sides and a string back.
Fully-fashioned trainers with details in imitation leather. Elasticated top edge, a loop front and back, and elasticated lacing with a drawstring at the top. Mesh insoles and patterned soles.

Short sports shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, mesh key pocket in the waistband and short slits at the hems. The polyester content of the shorts is partly recycled.
Cropped top in ribbed jersey with a V-neck, press-studs down the front and short sleeves.
Off-the-shoulder jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a double-layered trim at the top, long, wide sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
KELZUKI x H&M. Long-sleeved top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long polo-neck jumper in a soft knit with long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Running shorts in a double layer of fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and mesh key pocket in the waistband.
Short-sleeved dress in a rib knit.

Ankle-length suit trousers in woven fabric with covered elastication at the waist, a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, a welt back pocket and legs with creases. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Pool shoes in imitation leather with a padded, rhinestone-covered foot strap, moulded insoles and patterned soles.
Sleeveless dress in a viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and gathered seams at the waist and on the skirt. Unlined.

Set with a top, leggings and hairband. Sleeveless top in woven fabric with a small opening and button at the back of the neck and flounced trim at the front that continues over the shoulders. Leggings and hairband in soft cotton jersey. Hairband with a bow at the front.
Fitted skirt in sturdy stretch jersey with an elasticated waist. Slightly shorter at the front. Unlined.
Short dress in slub jersey made from a modal and cotton blend. Short cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and a gently flared skirt.
Dresses in soft, organic cotton jersey with a round neckline, short sleeves, a gathered seam at the top and a gently flared skirt. One dress has an all-over print.
Fancy dress costume in soft velour with a sheen. Hood with embroidered details and appliqués, a zip down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Chiffon blouse with an opening and button at the back of the neck and wide sleeves with ties at the cuffs. Lined.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Shirt in an airy, striped cotton weave with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat and hanger loop at the back, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Lightly padded bomber jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Ribbed stand-up collar, a zip down the front and flap side pockets with a press-stud. Zipped pocket and a fabric appliqué on one sleeve, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Quilted lining.
Hipster briefs in jersey made from a cotton blend with lace trims. Regular waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Fabric belt with an adjustable metal buckle. Width 3 cm.
Top in soft, organic cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and long sleeves in a contrasting colour.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Sports trousers with reflective details, an elasticated drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets with a concealed zip and tapered legs.
Treggings in sturdy stretch jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Sleeveless shirt dress in a soft, patterned cotton weave with a collar, button placket, chest pocket with a button and side pockets. Detachable belt in braided imitation suede and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Cold shoulder dress in an airy weave with an elasticated flounce at the top, smocked bodice and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Unlined.
Shorts in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist, a back pocket and raw, roll-edge hems.

Jacket in sturdy fabric with a high stand-up collar, low-dropped shoulders and a wind flap with metal press-studs down the front. Patch pockets with a flap and press-studs, and a drawstring at the waist. Lined.
Shorts in a patterned viscose weave with a high, elasticated waist.
Suede ankle boots with open heels and toes, a zip at the front and block heels. Satin linings, leather insoles and rubber soles Heel 8 cm.
Boots in imitation leather with an ankle-height shaft, lacing at the front, a zip on one side and a loop at the back. Fleece linings and insoles and chunky soles.

Backpack in grained imitation leather with a handle at the top and adjustable shoulder straps. Drawstring closure at the top and a flap with a concealed press-stud. Two outer compartments with a flap and concealed press-stud at the front. Lined. Size 15x27x35 cm.
Short running shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist. Lined with short sports shorts.
Bibs in water-repellent material with a hook and loop fastening at the back of the neck and a spill pocket at the bottom.
Fishnet socks with elasticated tops.
Long metal earrings with pendants in various shapes. Length approx. 9 cm.
